name: checkMenu
description: Check to see if the item, option, or extra requested match items on the menu
input: Name of the item, option, or extra that the customer requested

name: summarizeMenu
description: Get a summary of what is on the menu
input: Any sort of additional hint that might help with the summary

name: finalizeOrder
description: Finalize the order and send it for fulfillment

name: customer
description: Interact with the customer to continue assisting with the order
input: the message to send to the customer
